title: Landscape Spline Actor to BP Waypoint/Spline Actor Utility (SplineLSUtil)
description: The SplineLSUtil Unreal Engine Plugin generates a custom Blueprint Actor Spline and/or an array  of custom Waypoint Actors based on a selected LandscapeSplineActor.
longDescription: The SplineLSUtil Unreal Engine Plugin generates a custom Blueprint Actor Spline and/or an array of custom Waypoint Actors based on a selected LandscapeSplineActor. This Plugin is to help reduce the time spent when needing to create a Spline manually for tracks/roads and improves on accuracy. The Spline or Waypoints generated can be then used with your favorite Racing AI or homebrew AI that uses a Spline or Waypoint system.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Within minutes of easy setup, you can create a Blueprint spline or waypoint actors for your road/track projects via selecting a Landscape Spline Actor within your project.
  •  The choice of the target Blueprint Spline Actor and/or Waypoint Blueprint to be generated. Placeholders are delivered with the Plugin and can be replaced with your home brew BP Spline Actor and/or Waypoint Actor so can be used for example with your favorite Racing AI or Waypoint system.
  • Advanced filtering is supported if the Landscape Spline Actor contains multiple splines such as walls, trees etc. 
  • Multiple instances can be used if wanting to generate for example, the main track and also pits etc.
  • Array of Waypoints are available to be copied to help with a Waypoint system, e.g. if a Car Pawn object was based on an array of waypoints.

Code Modules:

  •  SplineLSUtil: Runtime Module

 

Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tCDttOUJLhVeciMizhgPQP2ClDiPmeOb/view?usp=drive_link

Tutorial Video: https://youtu.be/Rn7FNKX9M_Q


Important information


This Plugin requires a Landscape Spline Actor associated with your Landscape within your project to function (See Vehicle Template Startup project for example). Some projects having a Landscape do not always have a Landscape Spline Actor but it is possible to generate one using the gizmo copy functions to a new Landscape component.
